definition: to be in/to lie in/to consist in/to depend on/to rest with
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
surname Yu
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]
in/at/to/from/by/than/out of
the whole year must be planned for in the spring (idiom)/early planning is the key to success
pinyin: yi1 nian2 zhi1 ji4 zai4 yu2 chun1

definition: make your day's plan early in the morning (idiom)/early morning is the golden time of the day
pinyin: yi1 ri4 zhi1 ji4 zai4 yu2 chen2

definition: the problem is...
life is motion (popular saying with many possible interpretations)/Physical effort is vital for our bodies to function (Aristotle)./Life derives from physical exercise.
pinyin: sheng1 ming4 zai4 yu2 yun4 dong4

sentences.english: The main difficulty of off-line handwritten signature verification is feature extraction.
sentences.chinese: 离线手写签名鉴别的主要困难在于签名特征的提取。

sentences.english: The fear of the Lord, which is the beginning of wisdom, consists in a complete devotion to God.
sentences.chinese: 敬畏耶和华是智慧的开端，是在于完全委身于神。

sentences.english: Case of the table with the biggest difference is that dioica and face.
sentences.chinese: 案，案与桌的最大不同，在于腿子和面的关系。

sentences.english: One of the disadvantages of the phenothiazines is their potential for dystonic effects.
sentences.chinese: 吩噻嗪类药物弊端在于其潜在的张力不能反应。

sentences.english: It aims to improve the useability of sensor uncertain data stream and gain more information from it.
sentences.chinese: 目的在于从不确定传感器数据流中获得更多有用信息。

sentences.english: The reason flu keeps infecting us again and again is that the virus is constantly changing.
sentences.chinese: 流感能够反复感染我们的原因在于病毒的不断变化。

sentences.english: The only difference is that government's shares would be nonvoting until the government sold the shares at a later date.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的区别就在于政府在出售股票之前不具有表决权。

sentences.english: The key to following your heart is to learn to deal with fear.
sentences.chinese: 要做到心随所愿，秘诀在于学会克服恐惧。

sentences.english: All of this with only natural talent.
sentences.chinese: 所有这一切只在于他的自然天赋。

sentences.english: The advantage of Microsoft's method is that it works better for on-screen reading.
sentences.chinese: 微软的做法的好处在于它更利于屏幕阅读。

sentences.english: The problem with technological predictions is that they are almost always solution-driven.
sentences.chinese: 技术预测的问题在于，这种预测总是受解决方法驱使。

sentences.english: And so the only two differences are, right there, and there versus here and here.
sentences.chinese: 因此这两块代码的不同之处，就仅仅在于位置不同了。

sentences.english: The answer to the question, I think, gets at the very heart of the meaning of this elegy.
sentences.chinese: 问题的答案，在于这首挽歌的中心意义。

sentences.english: The grip cover lies directly over the hammering end of the tool.
sentences.chinese: 抓地力覆盖在于直接在锤打结束工具。

sentences.english: Now whether or not any of this is true, believe me, is neither here nor there.
sentences.chinese: 不管这些正确与否，相信我，关键不在于此。

sentences.english: A big sticking point will be Merkel's insistence on renegotiating the Lisbon treaty.
sentences.chinese: 目前的关键在于默克尔坚持要修订里斯本条约。

definition: itself/in itself/per se
characteristic (feature)/trait/feature/CL:個|个[ge4]
is/are/am/yes/to be
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
actually/in fact/really
place/location/(after a noun) place where it is located
difference/to distinguish/to discriminate/to make a distinction/CL:個|个[ge4]
essence/nature/innate character/intrinsic quality
rather
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
to embody/to reflect/to incarnate
immediately/at once
crucial point/crux/CL:個|个[ge4]/key/crucial/pivotal
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
